titles: To the right honourable the Lord Maior, aldermen, and commons of the City of London in Common Councell assembled. The humble petition of divers well-affected housholders and freemen of the said city
notes: The publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Praying for "a full and free Parliament".
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Early works to 1800.
